name: Sticky Ghost - Endless Sprint and Bridge Builder
name_original: Sticky Ghost - Endless Sprint and Bridge Builder
description:
+++ 48 sale! 100% FREE! +++

“Great Time Killer”
“Beautiful Graphics”
“Awesome Music”
___________________________________

Help the sticky ghost go over the deep pits. Your goal is to escape from the cemetery by making bridges between large gaps!

Hold your finger on screen to stretch out the stick and walk easily on the platforms. Be alert! If the stick is not long enough, the sticky ghost will not be able to go over the platform and will fall. How far can you easily walk off?

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Colorful graphics
High scores
Simple controls
Captivating Gameplay
